de.hotware.hotsound.audio.data

Interface IJavaSoundPlaybackAudioDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, IAudioDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicPlaybackAudioDevice

    public interface IJavaSoundPlaybackAudioDevice
extends IAudioDevice
    IPlaybackAudioDevice is used for actual playback devices. the normal interface can play to whatever it likes (even to potatoes if they like the sound of bytes)
    Author:
    Martin Braun
